title: New: R – Change
body:
Everything about **R** is rather perfect.

The idyllic blue background of his white, single line logo, and a track simply titled ‘Change’, which just so happens to come in at precisely three minutes, fits seamlessly with his bold, atmospheric sound. _Change_ is slick, expertly produced and one of the finest introductions to any artist I’ve heard this year.
